WorkItem.Description:
If a trx file has a test that has an unhandled exception then trx2html will crash when parsing the file. There are a couple of examples of this in other bugs, and they will usually say "The agent process was stopped while the test was running."

I have attached a patch that seems to correct the crash and treat them as failing tests.
WorkItem.Summary: Crash if trx has a test that had an unhandled exception
